actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that reports accompanying certain bills and joint resolutions reported by committees contain computations of the potential tax impact of such bills and resolutions on the individual taxpayer.

summary.text: Amends rule XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that reports accompanying public bills or joint resolutions which authorize or appropriate specific sums for a fiscal year contain a computation of the effects of such legislation on the taxes of the individual taxpayer.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that reports accompanying certain bills and joint resolutions reported by committees contain computations of the potential tax impact of such bills and resolutions on the individual taxpayer.
